name: Hol(e)y Thanos
description:
Game Jam Submission (Brackeys)

Theme: Holes

--------------------------------

How to Play:

Mouse only - Click to destroy something. You can destroy EVERYTHING, but be careful. You are a holy thanos, so you will regret evil things!

Try to safe the people and the living beings. 

Hope you like it :)

------------------------------

Design made all with Affinity Designer on iPad. It was quite a challenge to create such many graphics in that time :d. For the beautiful shader effect I have to thank brackeys for his amazing tutorial!

For the screaming Sounds I thank my girlfriend ;). The others were made with mouth, paper and some other stuff. Music made with Bosca Ceoil. 

All Sprites are available to everyone, just dm me. See ya!
